Articles.Content:
The infantry stabbed the army of cavalry.

My hill.

I reprogram the location of 'The Hill' to the middle of the ocean.

My volcano.

I reprogram the location of "The Hill" To the middle of a mountain.

My mountain.

i relocate "the hill" to the middle of space. i place a sign on the relocation computer that says not to touch the computer of a kraken will eat you. (this is not an empty threat there be krakens protecting the hill from relocation)

still Designer225's hill

I nuke the hill anyways Then I relocate It anyways and I relocate It to the Flareon Farm on Laythe.

My Flareon Army's hill.

I drop an spatial bomb on Laythe, making it implode. I then go to Eve and set up a military base chock-full of humans with miniguns.

My Eve hill.

My Army gets on a ship minutes before the explosion and goes to gilly and plants a nuke on Eve then Eve explodes and Gilly flies into Kerbol. The Flareons take the hill....

My Space Hill.

I hit the Flareons with a blck pudding and claim the hill.

My Space Hill.

My Flareon Army eats the pudding.

Then our ships nuke the hill...

My Flareon army's nonexistant hill

i bring Odin's hand back with my false moderator power and allow Fyre Flare to take it

Fyre Flare's hill

Your false moderator powers are self-moderated, leaving the hill neutral.

No one's hill.

Yay.

My hill.

I build a bigger hill next to the above hill, so that the above hill is permanently in the shadow of my big hill.

My bigger hill.

I undermine both hills so they collapse.

My flat land.

I fire a neutron star into the land and destroys the Solar System.

Then I make a hill on Laythe.

My Hill

The neutron star is angry after being kicked by a fire fox. He searches Laythe for you, destroying you in the process.

My tiny lump on a neutron star.

That tiny lump proves to be too much and the star collapses into a black hole.

My tangled up fabric of spacetime.

The black hole closes and I make a hill on Dres. (Cause Nobody likes Dres.)

My Dres hill...

A (very specific) spacetime anomaly mows it to shreds.

My scattered rocks on Dres.

I collect the rocks and build a castle for Dresmeralda.

Her castle.

I get space shuttles to Dres and get some antimatter.

My non-existent Dres castle

I build the castle. Using magic magnets, I also create a habitable atmosphere & environment on dres.

My dres castle. Fyre Flare also owns half of it.
Me and Tery are now truced!

I fly in my ship "Spearhead" with convenient anti-bio beams recently installed. I lase the whole castle.

My castle!

I fly my Mini-Shuttle "Elysium" With S.A Kirrim piloting Elysium and Spearhead go thru a Dres canyon and have a generic Sci-Fi Canyon Ship battle. Spearhead is destroyed.

Me and Tery's Dres castle.
